item.title: Monkey Banana Gibbon Air Red
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded: The Sony PS-LX310BT is a fully automatic belt-drive turntable that allows you to enjoy your vinyl records wirelessly via Bluetooth. It features a built-in phono preamp, a stable platter for smooth playback, and can connect to various audio systems and speakers for versatile listening options.

item.title: Electric Dreamscape
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded:
Alice in Chains’ acclaimed Jar of Flies is being reissued in celebration of its 30th anniversary.  The EP made history as the first of its format to debut at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 in its first week of sales.  Hit tracks like "No Excuses," "I Stay Away," and "Nutshell", extended the group's popularity.

  • A1. Steelheart Surge
  • A2. Circuitry Carnage
  • A3. Mechanized Mayhem
  • A4. Cybernetic Chaos
  • B1. Metal Monstrosity
  • B2. Synthetic Slaughter
  • B3. Electro-Extermination

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded:
ABOUT US

Welcome to Our Vinyl Store!

We're passionate about music and vinyl culture, offering a diverse selection of records from various genres and eras. Whether you're a seasoned collector or new to vinyl, we're here to help you discover your next favorite album.

SHOWROOMS

We Are Waiting for You in Our Showrooms

Browse through rows of meticulously curated albums spanning various genres and eras, from classic rock and jazz to electronic and indie. Feel the texture of each sleeve, admire the vibrant artwork, and discover hidden gems waiting to be unearthed.

Our knowledgeable staff is here to guide you through your musical journey, offering recommendations and insights to enhance your collection. Whether you're a seasoned collector or new to vinyl, our showroom invites you to rediscover the magic of music in its purest form.

SHOWROOM

816 Potomac Ave SE, Washington, DC 20003

Phone: +1 202 221 4000

Show On Map

SHOWROOM

816 Potomac Ave SE, Washington, DC 20003

Phone: +1 202 221 4000

Show On Map

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded:
STAY IN TOUCH

Your Questions Matter to Us

SHOWROOM

816 Potomac Ave SE, Washington, DC 20003

Phone: +1 202 221 4000

Show On Map

SHOWROOM

816 Potomac Ave SE, Washington, DC 20003

Phone: +1 202 221 4000

Popular Questions

Do you buy used vinyl records?

Do you sell new and sealed vinyl records?
